'''15w35e''' is the eighteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on August 28, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20190710041530/https://www.mojang.com/2015/08/minecraft-snapshot-15w35a</ref> to fix potential world corruption.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w35e|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|49578|Summoning ender crystals causes extreme lag (Multiplayer only).
|79990|{{cmd|tellraw @a null}} Not crashing anymore\error.
|;From the 1.8 development versions
|48920|{{key|Ctrl}}-Click on jukeboxes with discs, place empty (bugged) jukeboxes.
|;dev
|85863|Lingering potion thrown in fire/lava creates a huge fire.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 15w35e is the final of the three released 'e' snapshots, following [[12w30e]] and [[13w47e]].
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
